    • eliminarAlumno

      public void eliminarAlumno(String dni) throws Exception
      This method deletes an alumn based on their dni, if the dni is not correct it throws an exception
      Parameters:
      Dni - an id for each people, string 8 numbers and a letter at the end.
      Throws:
      Exception

    • estaRegistrado

      public Boolean estaRegistrado(String dni)
      This method checks if an alumn is already registered in the list of alumns.
      Parameters:
      String - dni, a String composed of 8 numbers and one letter in the last posistion(8).
      Returns:
      True if exists in the alumn list, false otherwise.

    • numeroAlumnos

      This method counts as Integer type for the number of alumns in the list.
      Returns:
